fr.xephi.authme.events

Class PasswordEncryptionEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.bukkit.event.Event
      • fr.xephi.authme.events.CustomEvent
        • fr.xephi.authme.events.PasswordEncryptionEvent

  • public class PasswordEncryptionEvent
extends CustomEvent
    This event is called when we need to compare or hash a password for a player and allows third-party listeners to change the encryption method. This is typically done with the HashAlgorithm.CUSTOM setting.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class org.bukkit.event.Event
